channel.title: Documentation – CPP via COM Interop
channel.description: Recent content in CPP via COM Interop on Documentation

item.title: Net: Using early binding in CPP
item.description:
Prerequisites
Please register Aspose.PDF for .NET with COM Interop, kindly check the article named Use Aspose.pdf for .NET via COM Interop.
Sample

This is a simple C++ code sample to extract text from PDF files using COM Interop using early binding. Before running the sample pay attention that

  • #import typelib.tlb makes C++ compiler generate 2 files: typelib.tlh and typelib.tli. By default, these files are generated only once, so you need to fully recompile the project in order to get new versions of them.
  • often importing only one TLB file leads to a great number of compiler errors. There are two types of errors: unresolved dependencies and conflicting names. If you can’t compile project open tlh file and look at the first lines which are commented. Here you’ll probably see the section which starts from the line
 // Cross-referenced type libraries:

and has one or more #import’s. Just copy them into your code before importing the main type library and do it in the same order. Thus you’ll bite the first type of problem. The next type of problem comes from the fact C++ environment has a big number of macros, predefined functions, etc., which can conflict with type library methods. For example, GetType has been already widely used in C++ but also Aspose.PDF has it. I found rename and auto_rename attributes of #import directive are very convenient to get rid of possible warnings and errors.

  • sometimes classes in uses namespaces conflict with names in type library, so in such cases, full class name must be used instead of using namespace. For example, see how StringToBSTR is called in the code snippet below.

For details please look at this post.

C++

 #include "stdafx.h"

#import "C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\System.Drawing.tlb"

#import "C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\mscorlib.tlb" auto_rename

#import "C:\Temp\Aspose.PDF.tlb" rename("GetType", "GetType_") auto_rename

using namespace System;

String ^earlyBinding(String ^file)


{


<span style="color:#000">String</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">^</span><span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>

<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// create ComHelper




Aspose_Pdf::_ComHelperPtr comHelperPtr;


<span style="color:#000">HRESULT</span> <span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">CreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">__uuidof</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">Aspose_Pdf</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">ComHelper</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">));</span>

<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">if</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">FAILED</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">hr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">))</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">&#34;Error occured&#34;</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>



<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">else</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// set license






Aspose_Pdf::_LicensePtr licPtr;


<span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">CreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">__uuidof</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">Aspose_Pdf</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">License</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">));</span>

<span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">SetLicense</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"C:</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Temp</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Aspose.PDF.lic"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// get Document




Aspose_Pdf::_DocumentPtr docPtr;


<span style="color:#000">docPtr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">OpenFile</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">((</span><span style="color:#000">BSTR</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span><span style="color:#000">System</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">Runtime</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">InteropServices</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">Marshal</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">StringToBSTR</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">file</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">).</span><span style="color:#000">ToPointer</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">());</span>

<span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// create Absorber




Aspose_Pdf::_TextAbsorberPtr absorberPtr;


<span style="color:#000">HRESULT</span> <span style="color:#000">hRes</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">CreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">__uuidof</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">Aspose_Pdf</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">TextAbsorber</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">));</span>

<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// browse text




docPtr->GetPages()->Accept_4(absorberPtr);


    <span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// retrieve text




BSTR extractedText = absorberPtr->GetText();


<span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">gcnew</span> <span style="color:#000">String</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">extractedText</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">docPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>



}


int main(array<System::String ^> ^args)


{


<span style="color:#000">CoInitialize</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">if</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">args</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Length</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">!=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">&#34;Missing parameters</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\n</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Usage:testCOM &lt;pdf file&gt;&#34;</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>



<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#000">String</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">^</span><span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">earlyBinding</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">args</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">]);</span>


<span style="color:#000">CoUninitialize</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Extracted text:"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"—</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\n</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">{0}"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">!=</span> <span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">nullptr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">?</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Trim</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">()</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">:</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">"<empty>"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"—"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>



}

item.title: Net: Using late binding in CPP
item.description:
Prerequisites
Please register Aspose.PDF for .NET with COM Interop, kindly check the article named Use Aspose.pdf for .NET via COM Interop.
Sample

This is a simple C++ code sample to extract text from PDF by means of COM Interop using late binding. For details please look at this post.

C++

 #include "stdafx.h"

#include "comdef.h"

using namespace System;

String ^lateBinding(String ^file)


{


<span style="color:#000">String</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">^</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>

<span style="color:#000">DISPID</span> <span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">DISPPARAMS</span> <span style="color:#000">dp</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">};</span>


<span style="color:#000">VARIANTARG</span> <span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">];</span>


<span style="color:#000">VARIANT</span> <span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">WCHAR</span> <span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">255</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">];</span>


<span style="color:#000">CLSID</span> <span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// create ComHelper




IDispatch* comHelperPtr;


<span style="color:#000">wcscpy_s</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Aspose.PDF.ComHelper"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">CLSIDFromProgID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">HRESULT</span> <span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">CoCreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">CLSCTX_ALL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_IDispatch</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">void</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">**</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">if</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">FAILED</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">hr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">))</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Error occured"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">else</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// set license




IDispatch* licPtr;


<span style="color:#000">wcscpy_s</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Aspose.PDF.License"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">CLSIDFromProgID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">HRESULT</span> <span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">CoCreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">CLSCTX_ALL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_IDispatch</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">void</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">**</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">OLECHAR</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">*</span> <span style="color:#000">setLicense</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span>  <span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"SetLicense"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">GetIDsOfNames</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">setLicense</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">vt</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">VT_BSTR</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">BSTR</span> <span style="color:#000">lic</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">SysAllocString</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"C:</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Temp</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Aspose.PDF.lic"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">bstrVal</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">lic</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">]</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">rgvarg</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">cArgs</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Invoke</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#000">DISPATCH_METHOD</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">SysFreeString</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">lic</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">licPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// get Document




OLECHAR* openFile =  L"OpenFile";


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">GetIDsOfNames</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">openFile</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">vt</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">VT_BSTR</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">bstrVal</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">BSTR</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span><span style="color:#000">System</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">Runtime</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">InteropServices</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">Marshal</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">StringToBSTR</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">file</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">).</span><span style="color:#000">ToPointer</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">]</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">rgvarg</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">cArgs</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Invoke</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#000">DISPATCH_METHOD</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">IDispatch</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">*</span> <span style="color:#000">docPtr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">pdispVal</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">comHelperPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">//————————




// get Pages for the Document

OLECHAR* pages =  L"Pages";


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">docPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">GetIDsOfNames</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">pages</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">cArgs</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">docPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Invoke</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#000">DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">IDispatch</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">*</span> <span style="color:#000">pagesPtr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">pdispVal</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">//————————




// create Absorber

IDispatch* absorberPtr;


<span style="color:#000">wcscpy_s</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Aspose.PDF.Text.TextAbsorber"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">CLSIDFromProgID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">str</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">CoCreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">pclsid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">CLSCTX_ALL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_IDispatch</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">void</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">**</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">//————————




// browse text

arg.vt = VT_DISPATCH;


<span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">pdispVal</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>

<span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">]</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">arg</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">rgvarg</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">vargs</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">cArgs</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">OLECHAR</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">*</span> <span style="color:#000">accept_4</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Accept_4"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">pagesPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">GetIDsOfNames</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">accept_4</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">pagesPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Invoke</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#000">DISPATCH_METHOD</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">//————————




// retrieve text

OLECHAR* _text = L"Text";


<span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">cArgs</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>

<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">GetIDsOfNames</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">_text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Invoke</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">dispid</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">IID_NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">GetUserDefaultLCID</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(),</span> <span style="color:#000">DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">dp</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">&</span><span style="color:#000">result</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">//————————




text = gcnew String(result.bstrVal);


<span style="color:#000">docPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>

<span style="color:#000">pagesPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000">absorberPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>



}


int main(array<System::String ^> ^args)


{


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">if</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">args</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Length</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">!=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span>

<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">&#34;Missing parameters</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\n</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Usage:testCOM &lt;pdf file&gt;&#34;</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>



<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#000">CoInitialize</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">String</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">^</span><span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">lateBinding</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">args</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">]);</span>


<span style="color:#000">CoUninitialize</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Extracted text:"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"—</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\n</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">{0}"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">!=</span> <span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">nullptr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">?</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Trim</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">()</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">:</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">"<empty>"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"—"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>



}

item.title: Net: Using wrapper in CPP
item.description:
Prerequisites
Please register Aspose.PDF for .NET with COM Interop, kindly check the article named Use Aspose.pdf for .NET via COM Interop.

We will use a wrapper to retrieve text from PDF documents.

C++

 #include "stdafx.h"

#import "C:\Temp\PdfText.tlb"

using namespace System;

String^ wrapper(String^ file)


{


<span style="color:#000">String</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">^</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>

<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// create ComHelper




PdfText::IPetrieverPtr retrieverPtr;


<span style="color:#000">HRESULT</span> <span style="color:#000">hr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">retrieverPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">CreateInstance</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">__uuidof</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">PdfText</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">Petriever</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">));</span>

<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">if</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">FAILED</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">hr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">))</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">L</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">&#34;Error occured&#34;</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>



<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">else</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// set license






retrieverPtr->SetLicense("C:\Temp\Aspose.PDF.lic");


<span style="color:#8f5902;font-style:italic">// retrieve text




BSTR extractedText = retrieverPtr->GetText((BSTR)System::Runtime::InteropServices::Marshal::StringToBSTR(file).ToPointer());


<span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">gcnew</span> <span style="color:#000">String</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">extractedText</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#000">retrieverPtr</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">.</span><span style="color:#000">Release</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>



}


int main(array<System::String ^> ^args)


{


<span style="color:#000">CoInitialize</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#204a87">NULL</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>

<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">if</span> <span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">args</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Length</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">!=</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">1</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">)</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">{</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Missing parameters</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\n</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">Usage:testCOM <pdf file>"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>


<span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">}</span>


<span style="color:#000">String</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">^</span><span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">=</span> <span style="color:#000">wrapper</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#000">args</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">[</span><span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">]);</span>


<span style="color:#000">CoUninitialize</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">();</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"Extracted text:"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"—</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">\n</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">{0}"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">,</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">!=</span> <span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">nullptr</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">?</span> <span style="color:#000">text</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">-></span><span style="color:#000">Trim</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">()</span> <span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">:</span> <span style="color:#4e9a06">"<empty>"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#000">Console</span><span style="color:#ce5c00;font-weight:bold">::</span><span style="color:#000">WriteLine</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">(</span><span style="color:#4e9a06">"—"</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">);</span>


<span style="color:#204a87;font-weight:bold">return</span> <span style="color:#0000cf;font-weight:bold">0</span><span style="color:#000;font-weight:bold">;</span>



}
